item.title: MIUI OS2.0.205.0.VMRTWXM Fastboot update for POCO F5 Taiwan
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: POCO F5 Taiwan

Codename: marble

Version: OS2.0.205.0.VMRTWXM | 15.0

Size: 6.8 GB

MD5: e8f51c699df30bb702b04490924dda7a

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
Fix: Occasional display glitches when opening or closing apps
Updated the security patch to July 2025. Increased system security.

Download: Here
